response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $10,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment, aiming to make this high-quality product more accessible to you while ensuring we maintain a fair valuation for our offerings. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can facilitate this transaction smoothly. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 10500}
